articles.author: Sheikh Saaliq
articles.title: India’s top court denies bail to 2 Muslim activists after 5 years in jail without trial - AP News
articles.description: India’s Supreme Court has denied bail to two Muslim student activists, Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam, who have been detained for years without trial. They were arrested five years ago under a strict security law, accused of inciting communal violence in Delhi…
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) Indias Supreme Court on Monday denied bail to two Muslim student activists who have spent years in detention without trial over a conspiracy case linked to one of the countrys deadlies… [+3114 chars]
